citation: Proclamation under the Residential Tenancy Amendment Act 2013 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Residential Tenancy Amendment Act 2013

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Residential Tenancy Amendment Act 2013 fix 1 August 2015 as the day on which sections 19 and 26 of that Act commence.

22 June 2015

C. WARNER

Governor

By Her Excellency's Command,

DR. VANESSA GOODWIN

Minister for Justice

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 1 July 2015

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Justice.
